17822987.admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

repnme.cdata!:
Papua New Guinea - New Britain Smallholder
            Development Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Smallholder Agricultural Development
            Project will help finance the cost of settlement of about
            580 smallholders, the development of about 4,640 acres of
            oil palms, and the provision of necessary infrastructure and
            associated services.
